nodes.text: The Salissia system was an Outer Rim Territories star system. It was the point of origin of the Human group known as Salissians. By 19 BBY, the Salissia system lay outside the borders of space controlled by the Galactic Empire.
The Salissia system was first mentioned in the 2009 reference book The Essential Atlas, written by Jason Fry and Daniel Wallace, which placed the system in grid square T-5.
